description:
So Many People Want To Write A Book And So Few Do

Many of us dream of having a book. But it can seem like such a big project, or we're not sure what to write about that we don't start. Or we start and don't finish. 

Your Time Is Now

And yet there has never been a better time to write a book. Publishing is more accessible than it's ever been before and what better way to get known and to establish your credibility than with a book?

How Can We Help

You already have expertise and experience, a story to tell, or some how-to knowledge. All you need to do now is to learn how to turn it into a book. So we put this programme together to teach you a step-by-step process that helps you finally finish that book you've been promising yourself. At the end of thirty days, if you follow all our steps, you'll have a completed book, that is ready for you to self-publish or to send to an agent or publisher.

The Right Foundation

We start by helping you set the right foundation - getting you grounded in your values and deciding on the right strategy for your book. We don't want you just to write - we want you to write a book with impact!

Write in Flow

And we ease you into the writing process. We give you daily targets and help you track your progress day by day with downloadable trackers.

Gain Confidence

And once you've gained some confidence we up the pace and help you bust through any procrastination to get that all important first draft complete.

Consolidate and Polish

And then we dedicate a whole section to editing and review. Because your first draft probably isn't quite up to finished book quality! You need to refine, reflect, and make sure that you are connecting with your reader - oh as well as those teeny tiny details like proof-reading and spell-checking.

Course Structure

The Instant Author Programme comes with a video introduction for each day's activity, and downloadable worksheets or spreadsheets to guide you through exactly what you need to do.

Your Commitment

We can't write your book for you, but we can teach you how to get to finished - and it doesn't need to take as long as you might think. We recommend you spend between one and two hours a day on the programme - but if you need to go slower, that's OK - you have full access to the material for as long as you need to get that book done.

So, do yourself a favour, and make this the month you finally get your book done!
title: Instant Author. Write Your Book In Thirty Days
